mapper.sql: comment_id, content, create_user_id, create_time, modify_user_id, modify_time, require_id, is_del
mapper.select: SELECT comment.comment_id as comment_id, comment.content as content, comment.create_time as create_time, comment.create_user_id as create_user_id, comment.is_del as is_del, comment.modify_time as modify_time, comment.modify_user_id as modify_user_id, comment.require_id as require_id, u.username as create_user_name FROM t_require_comment comment INNER JOIN t_user u ON u.user_id = content.create_user_id WHERE comment.require_id =#{requireCommentListCo.requireId} ORDER BY comment_id
